column5: Finally I caught my first fish of 2009! I was down at the creek for a hour and a half today and caught 2 small suckers  Nothing to amazing but hey it felt nice to have a fish on the line. Was using a small hook tipped with a worm and 2 split shot leaving it on bottom.  Pictures: 1st Fish of 2009   And the second little guy,   It could not of been a better day but I'll be sure to bring a bottle of water next time, was pretty hot walking up and down the river.
Great report and pics Mike  Got to love it when you can hook into the first fish of the year!!! Great job my friend Thanks for sharing Leechman
Thanks for the post mike, sure is a nice feeling to get the first ones of the season......

Good job, suckers can be quite fun to fish for. You should bring a bag with you next time and try to keep some smaller ones and freeze them for pike fishing witch I'm sure you'll be doing in the future lol.
I saw some smaller 5-10" sucker's, maybe I'll downsize some and try to get some. How should i freeze them, just in water say in a ziplock bag?
Slice them up as bait and sell them down in Dunville for the guys catching kitties
freeze them in a bag with no water, you will be good to go.  Oh and one per bag to make life easy... Good on ya for your first fish of 09, cheers!
Congrats on the first of 09, it took me a while to get mine.
The second pic of the fish looks like it has a lamprey wound or something on it.
Your right it does, I didn't notice that. After all it is a dirty ol sucker.
Good to see ya get out Mike .Looking forward to yout reports in the Thornes boat.  Next time I dare ya to stick that fish on your nipple
Great report Mike!  Suckers can be lots of fun to fish for when nothing else is hitting in spring.  I can't believe how skinny and cigar-like those suckers are.  WTG
Atta boyee!  Kewl way to hold a whistling trout.  That creek looks pretty troutish too...  I'd keep an eye out for drop-backs..  Next fish you hook into might give a good run!!  cheers HD
